articles.title: Kim Jong Un Watches Women's Football Match between Kalmaegi and Jebi Teams
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Watches Women's Football Match between Kalmaegi and Jebi Teams
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, watched a women's football match between the Kalmaegi team and the Jebi team together with service personnel of the KPA.
					 When he appeared in the grandstand, the players and spectators enthusiastically welcomed him, giving profound thanks to him.
					
					 The two teams fully displayed the football techniques which they have cultivated in their day-to-day trainings true to the WPK's idea of building a sports power.
					
					 The spectators warmly cheered with applause the footballers playing a nice game, displaying team spirit and persevering fighting will.
					
					 The Kalmaegi team beat its rival 2:0. 
					
					 When the match was over, Kim Jong Un warmly acknowledged the enthusiastic cheers of the players and spectators and congratulated the footballers on their successful match. 
					
					 He gave precious instructions to bring the nation's sports to a higher level by rounding off the Korean style sporting technique, tactical system and training method, noting that to develop the sports is important for successfully pushing forward the revolutionary struggle and construction and demonstrating before the whole world the dignity and honor of Songun Korea.
					
					 Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Tong Hwa, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Jang Tong Un, Pak Thae Su, Yun Jong Rin, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song, Kim Sung Yon and executive members of the WPK Committee of the KPA and commanding officers of the services and corps-level units.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities' Anti-DPRK Moves Condemned
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- As already known, the south Korean puppet warmongers recently opened to public the fact that they conducted a ballistic missile test-fire with a range of 500 km.
					 They are talking nonsense that they will develop a missile with longer range next year and then they will be able to put the whole area of the northern half of Korea within the striking range.
					
					 And while they are opening to public the fact that they newly formed a missile command in the south Korean puppet army, they are vociferating that their command is to "cope with the strategic force command of the north" and will "play a key role in building a 'south Korean style missile defense system.'"
					
					 The spokesman for the Academy of the National Defence Science said in a statement issued on Monday in this regard that this is an unpardonable grave provocation against the DPRK and a challenge to the public at home and abroad aspiring for the detente on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK has developed and had access to diversified various type missiles to cope with the U.S. moves to ignite nuclear war against the north but has never aimed at hurting the compatriots and talked about attacking the whole area of south Korea.
					
					 As the DPRK's powerful missile forces are a self-defensive deterrent to cope with the U.S. moves for aggression, their main target is the U.S. bringing the danger of the nuclear war to the Korean nation and the military bases of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces under any circumstances.
					
					 It is for firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the nation to consistently hold fast to the line of simultaneously pushing forward building of an economic power while bolstering up the national defence capability centered on the nuclear force.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that instigates and supports the development of ballistic missiles of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. helps the south Korean puppet forces in every way such as lifting restrictions on range and warhead weight and transferring its technology while inspiring them to develop ballistic missiles in order to use them effectively as a shock brigade for a war of aggression.
					
					 The double-dealing and hypocritical nature of the U.S. was more saliently revealed by the south Korean puppet forces' test-fire of its ballistic missile behind the curtain of the anti-DPRK missile racket under the U.S. patronage and backing.
					
					 As the U.S. and the south Korean regime felt guilty, hit hard by the answer given by the spokesman for the Strategic Force of the KPA laying bare their despicable nature, they kept mum about their criminal development of missiles and made much fuss about what they called drones in a foolish bid to divert the public attention elsewhere.
					
					 However, such a trite conspiratorial racket is not workable on anyone in this bright world.
					
					 They are in such awkward position that they can no longer take issue with the DPRK over its launch of ballistic missiles and the UN Security Council, too, has no reason to blame it.
					
					 It is needless to say that the DPRK's self-defensive deterrence such as nukes and ballistic missiles can never become subjects for negotiations as long as the U.S. persists in nuclear threat to the DPRK and its moves to invade the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster up its missile and nuclear deterrence
					
					under the prevailing situation no matter what others may say and no
					
					one is entitled to take issue with its measures.
					
					 The DPRK's Juche-based national defence science is firmly guaranteeing the dignity, sovereignty and vital rights of the country with the best and latest military science and technology and military hardware and no force can break the DPRK's firm faith and will or dampen its determination to achieve a final victory by dint of Songun.
					
					 Although the south Korean regime's development of its missiles seems to be a childish play, but the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. and the south Korean regime's extremely provocative remarks against it and the neighboring countries, too, will not look with folded arms on south Korea's increase in the range of its missiles.
					
					 If a US missile or the south Korean puppet forces' missile falls on any part of the DPRK, it will pound all the strongholds of the enemy with merciless shower of missiles to reduce them to ashes.
					
					 The DPRK never says empty words but will decisively react to nukes and missiles of the U.S. and other hostile forces in kind.
					
					 The south Korean war-like forces would be well advised to stop their reckless actions, properly understanding the disastrous consequences to be entailed by their missile test-fire.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Syria Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Syria Appointed
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Jang Myong Ho was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Syria, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Hungarian FM Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Hungarian FM Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Hungarian Ministry of Foreign Affairs led by Director General Peter Jakab arrived here on Monday by air.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Statement Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry dated Mar. 30 was distributed as the UN Security Council's official document S/2014/237 on Apr. 3.
					 The statement was released in connection with the fact that the sincere efforts of the DPRK to prevent a new war and ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula are facing a grave challenge of the hostile forces.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark the 40th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Further Developing the Public Health Service".
					 The work, published on April 9, Juche 63 (1974), clarifies the essence and requirements of the socialist preventive medical science, importance of health care, and issue of improving it, the matter of developing medical science and technology and issues of revolutionizing and working-classizing public health workers, strengthening the party leadership on the healthcare  and increasing the role of the officials.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 He said that Kim Jong Il's work serves as important guidelines as it clearly indicates the orientation, ways and tasks for developing the Juche-oriented healthcare and an immortal banner for giving full play to the advantages of the socialist healthcare by bringing about a great revolutionary turn in the healthcare.
					
					 He referred to the successes made in the healthcare over the past four decades.
					
					 Many centers for healthcare appeared in different parts of the country and bases for producing pharmaceutical and medical instruments and Koryo medicines were built to enable the people to fully enjoy the benefits of medical service.
					
					 Medical science and technology made rapid progress as evidenced by the establishment of telemedicine system, development of new painless delivery method and the development of cardiovascular surgiology on a high level. And their successes have been introduced into clinical practice to rapidly put medical service on a scientific and IT basis.
					
					 The reporter said that the immortal feats Kim Jong Il performed by steadily developing the Korean-style socialist healthcare system centered on the popular masses thanks to his original idea and energetic leadership will shine forever.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Meet to Celebrate Important Anniversary
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Meet to Celebrate Important Anniversary
 Kwaksan, April 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place in Kwaksan County of North Phyongan Province Monday to celebrate the second anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, made a report which was followed by speeches. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the election of Kim Jong Un was a historic event of great significance in steadily developing the WPK and the DPRK and accomplishing the Juche revolutionary cause. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who has developed the WPK into the great party of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, is the invincible brilliant commander bolstering up the national defence capability to firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the nation. 
					
					 He advanced the important guidelines that single-minded unity and invincible military muscle plus industrial revolution in the new century precisely mean a thriving socialist nation. He has wisely led the work to ensure that a decisive turn takes place in the building of an economic power and the drive for improving the people's living standard under the strong political and military guarantee. 
					
					 They stressed the need for all the agricultural workers and the UAWK members to unfailingly attain the goal of grain production this year, the 50th anniversary of the Theses on the Socialist Rural Question.

articles.title: Oratorical Contest Held by Officials and Members of Trade Unions
articles.content:
Oratorical Contest Held by Officials and Members of Trade Unions
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An oratorical contest "Forward for Final Victory True to Intention of Sun!" of officials and members of the trade unions from across the country took place at the Central Hall of Workers Monday to celebrate the 21st anniversary of the election of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as chairman of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 Put on the stage were oratories including "Great General Is Our Eternal Chairman of NDC," "Yearning," "Great Dedication," "Strong Wind of Leap forward" and "Gunfire for Final Victory."
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Jong Il for performing the immortal feats on behalf of the country and the people with his outstanding idea and energetic leadership.
					
					 They stressed that Kim Jong Il would always be alive in the hearts of the people as chairman of the NDC of the DPRK as he laid an eternal groundwork for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They also told stories about the personality of supreme leader Kim Jong Un as a great man as he is bringing the seeds of happiness sown by Kim Jong Il into rich fruits. 
					
					 They added that the care shown by Kim Jong Un represents a cradle of happiness for all Korean people as he is creating a great epic of respect for the people and love for them, giving top priority to  their interests, making them supreme and taking warm care of the children and people with love and affection. 
					
					 Present at the oratorical contest were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and officials of the trade unions, workers and unionists.

articles.title: World Health Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World Health Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An event took place at Okryu Children's Hospital Monday to mark the World Health Day. 
					 Present there were officials of social organizations and health and media fields, the UN resident coordinator and resident representative of the UNDP here, the representative of the WHO mission, members of other international organizations missions here, foreign diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Screened there was a video on preventing diseases caused by harmful insects. 
					
					 The participants watched an art performance given by kindergarteners and their hygienic information service activities. 
					
					 Intensive hygienic information service activities were also conducted in provinces on the same day.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the DPRK brought out new stamps, including two kinds of sheetlets. 
					 One of the sheetlets features the view of the Munsu Water Park built fashionably on the bank of the Taedong River in Pyongyang City. 
					
					 The other one, issued to mark the 2014 International Year of Family Farming and the 2014 International Year of Crystallography, pictures a wheat-reaping machine, a photo of X-ray discoverer, Roentgen and a piece of ice crystal.
					
					 An individual stamp, issued to mark the 120th anniversary of the Kapo Peasant War, features Jon Pong Jun, who was a leader of the peasant uprisers, as well as uprisers in fighting the Japanese army.
					
					 The war, launched by the Korean peasants across the country against the feudal rulers and the Japanese invaders, demonstrated the people's ardent patriotism and their might of unity.

articles.title: Vol. 4 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Published
articles.content:
Vol. 4 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Published
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Vol. 4 of "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes", a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was brought out in DPRK.
					 The book has four chapters dealing with anecdotes left by President Kim Il Sung in the period between March, Juche 25 (1936) and July, Juche 29 (1940) when he was steering the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Chapter 13 "Banner of Independence" contains anecdotes telling about the undying exploits Kim Il Sung performed by further consolidating the anti-Japanese armed ranks and victoriously leading the Korean revolution under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 Chapter 14 "Korea Is Alive" contains anecdotes telling stories that he successfully guided the historic expedition to Fusong and made an advance into the homeland, instilling confidence in the liberation of the country into the people.
					
					 Chapter 15 "Overcoming Difficulties" deals with anecdotes telling about the personality of Kim Il Sung as an iron-willed brilliant commander born of Heaven who firmly preserved the Juche-oriented stand and weathered the difficulties facing the Korean revolution due to the adverse consequences caused by the Rehe expedition and led the unprecedentedly arduous march to victory.
					
					 Chapter 16 "In the Area Northeast of Mt. Paektu" contains anecdotes telling stories that he again advanced into the homeland and wisely conducted political and military activities there.

articles.title: DPRK People Enraged at Park Geun Hye's Behaviors
articles.content:
DPRK People Enraged at Park Geun Hye's Behaviors
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Ten days has passed since the south Korean military gangsters committed outrages against the DPRK fishermen in the territorial waters in the West Sea of Korea.
					 But, Park Geun Hye has not yet made punishment of the criminals.
					
					 Otherwise, she paid lip service to "unification era" and "settlement of humanitarian issues", which give glimpse of her impudence.
					
					 Kim Ryong Ha, an old man living in Pothonggang District, told KCNA:
					
					 Park Geun Hye is a shameless human dreg.
					
					 If one makes a mistake, he or she should understand the wrongdoings and feel guilty conscience.
					
					 But, Park Geun Hye, bereft of elementary ethics and morality, has disgustingly spun out a spate of rigmaroles, putting to shame the Korean nation. 
					
					 She should be deleted from the list of members of the Korean nation.
					
					 O Hye Jong, an woman living in Rangnang District, said:
					
					 It is ridiculous for Park Geun Hye to make public the "three-point proposal for laying foundations for peace and unification" during her tour of Germany.
					
					 Park made the puppet army launch anti-DPRK military drills in alliance with the U.S. and fanned up atmosphere of confrontation with the fellow countrymen by scattering anti-DPRK leaflets.
					
					 Worse still, she has turned blind eyes to the brutal acts committed by the south Korean military gangsters against the DPRK's fishermen.
					
					 Park had worsened the north-south relations, which had begun to develop favorably thanks to the sincere efforts of the DPRK, coming under fire by the entire Korean nation.
					
					 And, it is shameless enough for her to talk about "peace and unification" of the Korean Peninsula. Only self-destruction is in store for her.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, south and overseas will surely achieve the peaceful reunification under the banner of the June 15 Joint Declaration.

articles.title: Taedonggang Passenger Service Office
articles.content:
Taedonggang Passenger Service Office
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of Pyongyang citizens take buses ran by the Taedonggang Passenger Service Office to reach recreation grounds and funfairs in the city.
					 Organized on the initiative of Marshal Kim Jong Un, it began service in October last year, operating several bus routes for the citizens to visit amusement sites.
					
					 Bus stops were appropriately arranged for the convenience of the citizens.
					
					 Some days ago, a new bus route began to open to service with the Meari Shooting Gallery as a destination. 
					
					 Now the office plans to open more bus routes in the city.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Sale of War Equipment to S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Sale of War Equipment to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The U.S. export of military hardware to south Korea is getting into strides. The U.S. plans to sell 40 F-35As, four Global Hawk high-altitude reconnaissance drones and other latest war equipment.
					 Such moves are aimed to intentionally wreck the peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and steadily aggravate its situation.
					
					 The U.S. Korea strategy is just for a war. After deciding a nuclear war strategy as its new Korea strategy, the United States has rounded off various operation plans for its implementation while steadily raising its actual war capacity through such ceaseless joint military exercises with south Korea as Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian. Last year it announced even a "tailored deterrence strategy" that means it has finished the preparations for preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The military hardware to be sold to south Korea will serve as key means in carrying into practice this nuclear war strategy. The U.S. intends to arm the south Korean forces with latest war equipment and then use them as a shock brigade in the second Korean War.
					
					 To this end, Global Hawks are to be forward-deployed in the Korean Peninsula from Guam.
					
					 Nowadays, American strategists are of the view that though the war plans to cope with "collapse of north Korea" have been completed, south Korea's military equipment are not sufficient enough to meet the demand for preemptive attack. 
					
					 Their view does not come simply from the economic interests of the U.S. It is the real intention of the U.S. to round off its military and material preparations for a new war, which need huge fund from it suffering financial shortage, by using the south Korean forces hell bent on confrontation with the DPRK, so as to easily get strategic interests in the peninsula.
					
					 With such wicked intention, the U.S. recently hindered the DPRK's peace policy and positive efforts for detente and even criticized its regular military drills as "provocation" to screw up the situation.
					
					 The facts clearly show again that the U.S. is an empire of evils, which does not hesitate to violate the destiny of any other country and nation for its own aggressive aim.
					
					 It's high time that all the Koreans turned out in the struggle to smash the war moves of the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Strengthening Unity of Koreans
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Strengthening Unity of Koreans 
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- It is an urgent issue at present to strengthen the unity of the entire nation in every way under the banner of the great national unity, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The U.S. and forces following it have become undisguised in the moves to hamstring the Korean nation's efforts for reconciliation and unity and escalate the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' moves to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK are allowed, this will lead to a war against the north and the Korean nation will suffer from immeasurable disasters.
					
					 The Korean nation should carry on the struggle with the strength of unity as the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces make ever-more desperate efforts against the country's reunification.
					
					 Now is the time for all the Koreans at home and abroad to closely unite irrespective of ideology, ism and political view, thoroughly smash the moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad and carry on the dynamic nation-wide struggle to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 No one in the world can match the inexhaustible strength of the united Korean nation.
					
					 The cause of the country's reunification has met a serious challenge, but no one can break or dampen the Koreans' will and aspiration to usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity with the united efforts of the entire nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stamping Out Bourgeois Ideology and Culture through Revolutionary Ideological Offensive
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stamping Out Bourgeois Ideology and Culture through Revolutionary Ideological Offensive
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The reactionary bourgeois ideology and culture are the counterrevolutionary and unpopular ideological poison leading people to corruption and degeneration, Rodong Sinmun Monday says in an article. 
					 The reactionary idea and culture of the imperialists are finding their way to all countries and regions of the world as mental narcotic poisoning the sound ideological consciousness of the popular masses and degenerating them, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Now the imperialists are leaving no means untried to focus ideological and cultural offensive on anti-imperialist and independent countries. 
					
					 The imperialists' ideological and cultural poisoning is a prelude to aggression and interference in internal affairs of other countries. 
					
					 They are calculating that the reactionary ideological and cultural poisoning are the most effective way for infiltrating into those countries with strong independence against imperialism not yielding to military aggression and highhandedness. 
					
					 Whereas the reactionary ideology and culture were their guide to aggression in the past, they are playing a leading part in aggression at present.
					
					 The ideological and cultural standoff with the imperialists is fiercer than other fronts. A moment's hesitation and a concession in this confrontation will give the reactionary ideology and culture a chance to infiltrate and, if then, the destiny of the country and the nation will go into bankruptcy. 
					
					 The stronger the consciousness of independence of the popular masses become and the further the revolutionary advance of progressive forces is made, the more viciously the imperialists resort to ideological and cultural poisoning. 
					
					 Those countries and people desirous of independent development and social progress should thoroughly stamp out the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning of the imperialists through the revolutionary ideological offensive.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's Mud-slinging at Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Slammed
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's Mud-slinging at Popular Uprising on Jeju Island Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People carried an editorial on April 3 denouncing the puppet chief executive for insulting the Popular Uprising on Jeju Island.
					 The editorial recalled that Park Geun Hye said she would not take part in an event to commemorate the April 3 popular resistance. It went on:
					
					 She noted she did not recover from the fatigue from her foreign tour. But, in fact, it will be a candid answer that she made this decision, afraid of the rebuff from a conservative organization.
					
					 It is doubtful that Park has the sincerity to console the soul of the April 3 uprisers and not to repeat the unhappy history, though she set it as her commitment to election to "correctly settle the April 3 case".
					
					 During the April 3 popular resistance which erupted against the establishment of a "separate government" in south Korea, innocent people on Jeju Island were mercilessly killed by the U.S. "military administration" and pro-U.S. forces including Syngman Rhee.
					
					 Those denying the resistance are the pro-U.S. forces and forces praising the dictatorship.

articles.title: S. Korea's Plan to Open Rice Markets Protested
articles.content:
S. Korea's Plan to Open Rice Markets Protested
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of Peasants Associations held a press conference in Seoul on April 3 in protest against the regime's move to open rice markets, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 The speakers at the press conference disclosed the move of the authorities to totally open the rice markets.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime seeks to leave the rice markets to the tender mercy of outsiders and deteriorate the livelihood of peasants, they held.
					
					 They vowed to fight it out, risking any sacrifice to stop the opening of the rice markets. They made public an action plan including the opening of a large-scale peasants' rally and formation of the Headquarters of All-People Movement.
					
					 They warned that they would not vote for any political party and candidate who support the opening of the rice markets in the upcoming local elections.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Czech Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was posted by the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association on its website on March 31.
					 The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader 
					
					Kim Jong Il performed in their lifetimes. It indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Special Write-ups Carried by Papers of Myanmar, Laos
articles.content:
Special Write-ups Carried by Papers of Myanmar, Laos
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Papers of Myanmar and Laos carried special write-ups, illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age on March 31 carried an article titled "Eternal Sun of Juche" under the banner line of "We pay highest respects to HE President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, on the occasion of his 102nd birth anniversary, April 15, 2014". The article said:
					
					 Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, is praised by the world revolutionary people as the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He provided the great guiding idea of the cause of independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 The brilliant victory and successes achieved by the Korean people in socialist construction under his wise leadership greatly encouraged the world revolutionary people in their struggle for independence.
					
					 The March 31-April 6 issue of the Laos paper Heng Ngan noted in an article:
					
					 Kim Il Sung opened up a new era for developing the international relations based on independence.
					
					 He raised independence as the fundamental principle of state-to-state relations, and the exercise of equality and sovereignty in external activities as the iron rule.
					
					 He is the closest comrade of the world revolutionaries and progressives.
					
					 He will be alive in the hearts of the world people aspiring after independence as the eternal sun of Juche as he opened up the era of independence and devoted his whole life to the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria, Indonesia
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Nigeria, Indonesia
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows took place in Nigeria and Indonesia between March 20 and 28 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Present there were personages of all social standings and masses of the relevant countries.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Eternal asset praising the sun" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The managing director of the Nigeria-Korea Stereo Industrial Company who is chief of the Kim Jong Il Library of Enugu State in Nigeria said after watching a film:
					
					 Kim Il Sung opened up an era of independence and devoted his whole life to the victorious advance of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He is alive in the hearts of world progressive mankind as the sun of Juche.
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company said that the Korean People's Army founded by Kim Il Sung has been widely known as the strongest army any country's army cannot match in idea and faith and the invincible armed forces equipped with modern offensive and defensive means capable of defeating any aggressor.
					
					 The director of another company of Indonesia said that after watching the film he could know well how deeply the world progressive people are revering Kim Il Sung and he was deeply impressed by it.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An article titled "The father of the people" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on Mar. 30.
					 The article said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, is being praised by the Korean people as benevolent father.
					
					 He was not only the leader of one country but also the great father who looked after the life and destiny of the people.
					
					 Thanks to his warm love for the people the free healthcare and education systems have long been enforced in the DPRK and the improvement of the standard of the people's living has become the supreme principle of the activities of the Party and the state.
					
					 The people were his dear sons and daughters.
					
					 He made an endless journey for field guidance for them even on his birthday.
					
					 He devoted himself to improving the standard of the people's living, walking along lanes between fields of co-op farms even in the last days of his great life in 1994.
					
					 A photo of him finding himself among children is very impressive, in particular, when remembering him, father of the people.
					
					 He liked very much to spend time with children as he was possessed of such a transparent outlook on the rising generation as putting forward the children as the king of the country and sparing nothing for them.
					
					 His tender-hearted image will always be deeply cherished in the hearts of progressive mankind.

articles.title: Korean Friendship Association Raps Japan for Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Korean Friendship Association Raps Japan for Suppressing Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain released a statement on Mar. 30 condemning the Japanese authorities for their moves to seize the Korean Hall of  the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 The statement said:
					
					 We bitterly denounce the Japanese authorities for their violence to seize land and building of the Korean Hall.
					
					 Japan imposed untold misfortune and pain on the Korean people during its occupation of Korea for more than 40 years.
					
					 Many Koreans were taken to Japan owing to its occupation of Korea.
					
					 They have been persecuted every day and time, not enjoying a peaceful life even after the Second World War.
					
					 We strongly demand Japan stop at once suppression of Koreans in Japan and its moves to seize the Korean Hall.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Condemn Japan for Its Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Condemn Japan for Its Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Mar. 29 condemning Japan for its suppression of Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan).
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Japanese authorities prodded the Tokyo District Court to commit a fascist violence of deciding to allow the sale of the land and building of the Korean Hall of Chongryon on Mar. 24.
					
					 Such an illegal act of the Japanese authorities seeking a politically-motivated sinister purpose is a wanton violation of the dignity and vital rights of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan and a grave encroachment on the sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese authorities are feigning ignorance of this, talking about a "judgment of a judicial organ" in a bid to evade the blame for seizing the Korean Hall but it is a poor excuse for concealing its sinister criminal attempt.
					
					 It is the real intention of the Japanese authorities to eliminate the center for activities of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and thus obliterate the patriotic movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Such an act is a criminal and fascist violence and terrorist act against Koreans in Japan and an act of discriminating the Korean nation.
					
					 In case the Japanese authorities continue political suppression and national persecution against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan while resorting to the moves to seize the Korean Hall of Chongryon, the DPRK will be left with no choice but to take countermeasures to it.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in India
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in India
 Pyongyang, April 7 (KCNA) -- An Indian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) was formed in New Delhi on April 1.
					 The general secretary of the National Congress Party of India was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee agreed to organize diverse events including a meeting, seminar and lecture in celebration of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol femenino entre equipos Kalmaegi y Jebi
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia competencia de futbol femenino entre equipos Kalmaegi y Jebi
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC presencio la competencia de futbol femenino entre el equipo Kalmaegi y el Jebi.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al palco, las jugadoras y los espectadores le acogieron con efusivas aclamaciones.
					
					Los dos equipos manifestaron sin reserva la tecnologia de futbol adiestrada en los dias ordinarios en pleno acato al proposito del PTC de construir la potencia deportiva.
					
					Los espectadores dieron efusivos aplausos a las jugadoras quienes pusieron de pleno manifiesto su elevada tecnica futbolistica con el espiritu colectivo y tenaz espiritu combativo. 
					
					En el juego, el once Kalmaegi vencio a su rival Jebi por 2 a 0.
					
					Terminada la competencia, el Mariscal envio el calido saludo de respuesta a efusivas aclamaciones de las jugadoras y espectadores y felicito el exito de ellas en la competencia.
					
					Desarrollar el deporte es la labor importante para promover con exito la lucha revolucionaria y la labor constructiva y exaltar a todo el mundo la dignidad y el honor de la Corea del Songun, senalo y dio valiosas instrucciones que se presentan para completar la tecnologia de deporte, el sistema de tacticas y los metodos de entrenamiento al estilo coreano y elevar a la etapa mas alta el deporte del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, So Hong Chan, Kim Su Gil, Kim Tong Hwa, Jo Kyong Chol, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Pyong Chol, Kim Myong Sik, Jang Tong Un, Pak Thae Su, Yun Jong Rin, Han Kwang Sang, Hwang Pyong So, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song y Kim Sung Yon, los miembros ejecutivos del comite del PTC en el EPC y los comandantes de las unidades a nivel del tipo de ejercito y del cuerpo de ejercito.

articles.title: Vocero de ACDN rechaza anuncio surcoreano sobre la prueba y desarrollo de misiles contra RPDC
articles.content:
Vocero de ACDN rechaza anuncio surcoreano sobre la prueba y desarrollo de misiles contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Como ya trascendidos, los belicistas titeres surcoreanos publicaron oficialmente hace poco la prueba de lanzamiento del misil balistico con un alcance de 500 km y agregaron que desarrollaran en el proximo ano el otro de alcance mas largo con que puedan atacar toda la extension geografica norcoreana.
					Ademas, al anunciar la fundacion de la nueva comandancia de misiles en el ejercito surcoreano, dijeron que "ella servira para hacer frente a la comandancia de las fuerzas estrategicas del Norte y cumplira el papel principal en el establecimiento del ´sistema antimisiles´ de tipo surcoreano".
					
					En su declaracion fechada 7, el portavoz de la Academia de Ciencias de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea senalo que ese anuncio constituye imperdonable provocacion a la RPDC e intolerable desafio a la opinion publica interna y externa que desea el relajamiento de tension en la Peninsula Coreana, y continuo:
					
					Si bien la RPDC posee los misiles diversificados desarrollados frente a la campana de guerra nuclear de EE.UU., ella nunca ha apuntado con ellos a la parte connacional ni dicho que atacara con los mismos todo el territorio surcoreano.
					
					Las poderosas fuerzas de misiles de la RPDC son el disuasivo autodefensivo para enfrentarse a la campana agresiva de EE.UU. y su blanco principal es este imperio y sus bases militares que traen a la nacion coreana el peligro de guerra nuclear.
					
					Para defender firmemente la soberania y la dignidad nacional, la RPDC mantiene constantemente la linea de acelerar la construccion de potencia economica consolidando el poderio de defensa nacional centrado en las fuerzas nucleares.
					
					  EE.UU. es el que fomenta y apoya activamente el desarrollo de misiles balisticos de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Con el fin de usar a esos ultimos como brigada de choque en la guerra de agresion, EE.UU. les ayuda en todos los sentidos como levantar las medidas de restriccion en el alcance y el peso de ojiva, etc. y transferir las tecnologias.
					
					Con el reciente lanzamiento de prueba de los titeres surcoreanos realizado bajo el amparo y la ayuda de EE.UU., se han revelado la dualidad y la naturaleza hipocrita de este pais.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana, atacados en la llaga cuando se ha publicado la respuesta del portavoz de las fuerzas estrategicas del EPC, intentan distraer la atencion armando escandalo con el supuesto caso de drone sin hacer referencia alguna al desarrollo de misiles.
					
					Pero, su rutinaria campana intrigante no sera aceptada a nadie en el mundo actual.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana no pueden calumniar mas el lanzamiento de misiles balisticos de la RPDC y tampoco tendra nada que decir el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Mientras continuen la amenaza nuclear y la campana belica anti-RPDC de EE.UU., no pueden ser, sin duda alguna, objetos de regateo las armas nucleares y los misiles balisticos y otros medios de disuasivo autodefensivo de la RPDC.
					
					Frente a la situacion dada, la RPDC fortalecera mas el poder de sus misiles y su disuasivo nuclear y nadie podra cuestionarlo.
					
					Las autoctonas ciencias de defensa nacional de la RPDC garantizan con las superiores ciencias y tecnicas militares y los armamentos sofisticados la dignidad, la soberania y el derecho a la existencia y ninguna fuerza podra doblegar la firme conviccion, voluntad y decision de ella de lograr con el Songun la victoria final.
					
					Aunque la RPDC considera como un juego de ninos el desarrollo de misiles de los titeres surcoreanos, no quedara con brazos cruzados ante la chismografia de ellos sumamente provocativa y belicosa ni los paises vecinos se mantendran indiferentes al aumento de alcance de misiles surcoreanos.
					
					Si cae en cualquier zona de la RPDC un solo misil norteamericano o surcoreano, ella destruira con una implacable avalancha de misiles todos los bastiones enemigos.
					
					La RPDC no habla por hablar y respondera a las armas nucleares y misiles de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles con los mismos armamentos.
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia dandose cuenta de las desgracias que puedan buscar su campana de misiles.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Siria
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador de RPDC en Siria
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jang Myong Ho fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC en la Republica Arabe de Siria.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto por el 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto por el 40o aniversario de obra de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto por el 40o aniversario de publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Por un mayor desarrollo de la salud publica".
					La obra publicada el 9 de abril del 63 (1974) de la Era Juche aclara la esencia y demanda de la medicina preventiva socialista, la importancia de los servicios medicos y los problemas para su mejoramiento, el tema de desarrollar la ciencia y tecnica de la rama, el de infundir la conciencia revolucionaria y los rasgos de la clase obrera a los funcionarios de salud publica, consolidar la direccion del partido sobre la rama y elevar el papel de los funcionarios, etc. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					El orador dijo que la obra del Dirigente es la guia programatica, que ilumina claramente el rumbo, remedios y tareas para el desarrollo de salud publica de tipo jucheano, y la bandera eterna para poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del sistema sanitario socialista al registrar un viraje revolucionario. 
					
					En referencia a los exitos alcanzados durante 40 anos pasados en la rama, dijo como sigue: 
					
					Por doquier del pais se han levantado numerosas bases de servicios publicos y acondicionados los establecimientos farmaceuticos, las fabricas de aparatos medicos y las bases de produccion de medicamentos tradicionales Coryo. 
					
					Se ha establecido el sistema de telemedicina y se ha desarrollado nuevo metodo de parto sin dolor. Igualmente, se desarrollaron rapido la ciencia y tecnica de la medicina y sus exitos se generalizan en la clinica, de manera que se elevaran el nivel cientifico y el de informatizacion de los servicios medicos. 
					
					Brillaran siempre las imborrables proezas del Generalisimo Kim Jong Il quien con su original idea y energica guia, desarrollo incesantemente el sistema sanitario socialista de Corea centrado en las masas populares.

articles.title: Efectuado concurso nacional de oratoria de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
articles.content:
Efectuado concurso nacional de oratoria de funcionarios y miembros de FGSC
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 7 en la Casa Central de Obreros el concurso nacional de oratoria de los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea intitulado como "!Adelante hacia la victoria final en acato al gran proposito del Sol!" en ocasion del 21o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En la ocasion hubo varias oratorias con los titulos de "El gran General es nuestro eterno Presidente del CDN", "Anoranza", "Gran abnegacion", "Oleada de saltos", "Canonzazo de  victoria final", etc.
					
					Los oradores elocuentes elogiaron las proezas realizadas por el Dirigente ante la patria y el pueblo con su destacada idea y direccion energica.
					
					Subrayaron que el Dirigente, quien preparo la base solida para la empresa de la revolucion del Juche, estara vivo en el corazon del pueblo como Presidente de CDN de la RPDC.
					
					Narraron las nobles cualidades del Mariscal Kim Jong Un que realiza uno tras otro los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Apuntaron que es la cuna de felicidad de los coreanos el regazo del Mariscal quien da prioridad al interes del pueblo, dispensa gran amor a los ninos y habitantes de todo el pais y escribe gran epopeya de respeto y amor al pueblo.
					
					En el acto tomaron parte el presidente Hyon Sang Ju y otros funcionarios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, los obreros y los gremiales.

articles.title: Celebrado acto festivo de trabajadores agricolas
articles.content:
Celebrado acto festivo de trabajadores agricolas 
Pyongyang, 7 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 2o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea tuvo lugar el dia 7 en el distrito de Kwaksan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte el acto festivo de los trabajadores agricolas y miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea.
					Hubo discurso de Ri Myong Gil, presidente del Comite Central de la UTAC, e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la eleccion del Mariscal como Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC sirvio de un acontecimiento historico de gran significado en el desarrollo incesante del PTC y la RPDC y en el cumplimiento de la causa de la revolucion del Juche.
					
					Elogiaron al Mariscal, quien fortalecio el PTC como partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, como genial comandante invicto que consolida el poderio defensivo del pais y protege firmemente la soberania y dignidad de la nacion.
					
					Se refirieron a que el Mariscal presento la guia programatica de que la unidad monolitica mas la capacidad militar invencible y la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo son precisamente el Estado prospero socialista y dirige sabiamente para que se produzca el viraje trascendental en la construccion de la potencia economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo bajo la firme garantia politico-militar.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de alcanzar a toda costa la meta de cereales de este ano significativo en que se cumple el 50o aniversario de la publicacion de la tesis sobre el problema rural socialista.
